invocation.name: Banner of Mendiz I
invocation.description: Causes an immediate morale check for everyone except the priest within range, though Laranian's get a +10 bonus. Failure causes people to hesitate and regroup. Failure by more than 10 causes rout. This invocation can only be called on once per battle.

invocation.name: Courage of Mendiz I
invocation.boost: Affects all will rolls, including opposed rolls for magical/divine effects.
Affects all Larani and Peoni adherants in a range of short (50m)
invocation.description: Gives the subject a bonus to will rolls to resist fear and and morale checks. The bonus is equal to 2 per 5 rolled. Does not stack with similar invocations or spells.

invocation.name: Curse of the Reluctant Warrior I
invocation.description: One chosen subject in range suffers a penalty to all combat skills for the duration of the combat equal to two fifths the invocation roll. Does not stack with similar invocations or spells.

invocation.name: Fast of the Tirannon I
invocation.description: Subject does not need to eat or drink for one day per five rolled with the invocation. All attributes however are at -1. If the subject does eat or drink, the invocation is ended.

invocation.name: Larani's Shield I
invocation.boost: All within Near can be affected
invocation.description: Subject's defence is increased by one fifth the invocation roll as long as they are using a shield. This is increased by 50% if they are protecting defenceless women nearby.

invocation.name: Light of Dolithor I
invocation.description: Increases or decreases light in a spherical zone around the priest, up to a number of metres equal to one half the invocation roll. Can change the light level one step, across pitch black, starlight, moonlight, twilight, daylight and very bright.

invocation.name: Passage to Tirithor I
invocation.description: An invocation to cure infection. At the base difficulty, an infection of severity 1 is immediately cured (infections are rated from 1 to 5). Each five rolled above this, an extra level of infection is cured. Infections higher than that cured by be unaffected, reduced or slowed, depending on circumstances. Multiple uses have no effect however.

invocation.name: Valamin's Insight I
invocation.boost: Grants a feeling as to best action
invocation.description: Offers insight when the priest is unsure about what to do. This only applies to moral quandaries. At the basic level, a feeling of the consequences of possible actions is given.

invocation.name: Bandage of St. Perelyne II
invocation.description: Stops bloodloss and heals one wound level on the person touched. Alternatively, it can cure all stuns the person suffers from. Can be performed once a day on a single person.

invocation.name: Blessing of the Winged Lion II
invocation.description: The person touched receives a soak bonus against ethereal fire equal to twice the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Endurance of St. Amrathas II
invocation.description: The person has their stamina increased by one for every twenty points of invocation rolled.

invocation.name: Herald of the End of Life II
invocation.description: Blesses a sword with some of the attributes of Avarkiel, Larani's holy sword. While the invocation lasts, the sword has a damage bonus of one fifth the invocation roll. This cannot be combined with other bonuses.

invocation.name: Shield of Hyvrik II
invocation.description: When layed upon a checkered shield, the defence of the shield is increased by two fifths the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Knight's Peace II
invocation.description: Creates a spherical zone centered on the priest within which all Laranian followers are disinclined to fight. If they wish to fight, or continue fighting, they must make a will check against the invocation roll. If they are attacked while within the zone, they will try to surrender, or if that fails, fight.

invocation.name: Oathbinder III
invocation.description: A blessing is laid upon the sword, and it becomes like Avarkiel for a year. If the bearer of the sword is Laranian, then the sword gains a bonus to initiative, attack and damage equal to one fifth the invocation roll. A non-Laranian will find the sword to have a penalty equal to twice this.

invocation.name: Orthas' Faith II
invocation.description: All Laranians within range gain a bonus of one fifth the invocation roll to attack and initiative rolls for the duration of the combat.

invocation.name: Protection of Angcaradina II
invocation.boost: Invocation can be layed upon another touched
Invocation can be layed upon all those within Near (15m)
invocation.description: Protects the priest from harm, granting a bonus to soak equal to one fifth the invocation roll. The priests armour and clothes (or skin, if they have none of the former) takes on a blood red hue. Against fire damage (ethereal or natural), the bonus is twice this.

invocation.name: Red Robes Flowing II
invocation.description: Causes all adherents in range to go berserk.

invocation.name: Valamin's Sleep II
invocation.description: Causes the target to fall asleep, if they fail their will check.

invocation.name: Larani's Charge III
invocation.description: All mounted Laranians within range are given a bonus to initiative, attack, damage and soak for their next mounted charge only. The bonus is equal to two fifths the invocaton roll. Further, the recipients of the charge attack must make a bravery check of 25 in order to stand their ground.
